resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

cyb70289 commented on a change in pull request #11603:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11603#discussion_r742692914



##########
File path: .github/workflows/cpp.yml
##########
@@ -53,7 +53,7 @@ jobs:
     name: ${{ matrix.title }}
     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
     if: ${{ !contains(github.event.pull_request.title, 'WIP') }}
-    timeout-minutes: 45

Review comment:
       Asan job runs about 44m in a recent test https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/4100836200
   Sometimes it timeout.




--

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
Met with this issue some times, one recent log at
https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/4093756663

Possibly due to timeout?
fields.summary: [CI][C++] ASAN UBSAN CI job is cancelled sometimes

comments.body:
Yes: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/.github/workflows/cpp.yml#L56

If 45min is short, we should increase it.

I see latest successful job takes 44m 27s. Looks we should increase it.
https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/4100836200
